description:
Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.

This description is relevant for UK residents only.

Make your spend, well-spent

- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way

Send money near, far, wherever they are

- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension

Save the interest-ing way

- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying

Explore investments (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)

- Start investing from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Investment services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 11567840) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN: 933846). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.
End the overspend

- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).

Unlock security features that you control

- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money

How we protect your money

- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900562). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.

Aircash is a multi-currency digital wallet and issuer of the Aircash Mastercard card.

With Aircash, users can top up instantly and easily with cash or any credit/debit card. Withdraw money at any ATM, point of sale of Aircash partners or bank account. Send to friends or family, pay for various services, buy telecom and digital vouchers and top up numerous online accounts.
With Aircash, you have full control over your money – fast, easy, and always available. With the Aircash Wallet and Aircash Prepaid Mastercard, you have worldwide flexibility, whether online, in stores, or at ATMs.

AIRCASH MASTERCARD
Get the Aircash Mastercard at our retail locations or through Amazon and use it at over 30 million locations worldwide. The card is managed directly through your Aircash Wallet – simply load it and get started!

DEPOSIT
Instantly and fee-free, load funds to your Aircash Wallet with cash at more than 200,000 retail locations or with any credit/debit card.

MONEY TRANSFER
Send money to friends and family, no matter where they are. The funds are available in seconds in their Aircash Wallet in their currency.

SERVICES
Buy tickets, pay bills, get vouchers, and top up online accounts – all in one app.

WITHDRAWAL
No problem – use your Aircash Mastercard at ATMs worldwide or withdraw cash from your Aircash Wallet at selected retail locations.

Get the Aircash app now and enjoy all the everyday benefits Aircash has to offer!

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

Be among the first!
The first smart banking in Croatia is now on mobile phone and tablet and brings a new perspective to money.

What has George in store for you:

• George makes it easy: self-transfers, Bill Payments and domestic transfers - easy, fast and go!
• George knows them all: With Autosuggest you transfer your George contacts even faster. You know the name, George the IBAN.
• Scan & Pay & smile please: transfer faster via camera.
• Accounts & Co: Keep track of your finances. Live and in color.
• Go faster: With shortcuts from the account list directly to the desired function.
• Easy Going: Fast and secure access to George with Easy Access and your phone's lock (eg fingerprint, PIN).


And there's more: George is constantly being expanded with innovative features.

To experience George on mobile/tablet, you need an account with Erste bank as well as a valid George account.

Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to "see" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.

KEKS Pay je zabavna i jednostavna aplikacija za brzo i sigurno slanje i primanje novca – i to bez ikakvih naknada! Duguješ nekome za ručak? Netko tebi duguje za karte za kino? Besplatno skini KEKS Pay i olakšaj si život. Uživaj u slatkim transakcijama već danas!

Svi su dobrodošli
Iako je KEKS Pay aplikacija Erste banke, možeš je koristiti neovisno o tome u kojoj banci ti ili tvoji frendovi imate račun bez da pritom plaćaš ikakve naknade za prijenos novca.

Stvarno brzo i jednostavno
Skini i instaliraj aplikaciju u svega 2 minute, a onda šalji ili zatraži lovu od frendova. Podatke za primanje i slanje love trebaš upisati samo jednom, a od frenda nijednom. Da bi mu poslao lovu, dovoljno je da imaš njegov broj mobitela. Da, dobro si shvatio - nema više zamornog upisivanja dugačkih brojeva i šifri!

Podijeli troškove
Želiš s frendovima skupiti lovu za rođendanski poklon, ali ne želiš voditi evidenciju plaćanja i boriti se s gotovinom? KEKS Pay je pravo rješenje za tebe! Više ne moraš brinuti jesu li svi platili i vući lovu naokolo. Kreiraj chat grupu, pozovi ekipu da se sve lijepo dogovorite i jednostavno prati uplate putem mobitela.

Pozovi frenda
Lovu možeš poslati i nekome tko nema KEKS Pay. On će dobiti SMS s uputama za preuzimanje aplikacije, a potom i tvoje uplate, u samo nekoliko klikova. Baš kao što si ti već učinio, i on će upisati IBAN na koji želi primati uplate. U slučaju da ne preuzme aplikaciju u roku od 5 dana, tebi će lova biti pošteno vraćena.

Sigurnost prije svega
Što se tiče sigurnosti, tu nemaš nikakvog razloga za brigu - brojevi kartica nisu zapisani na mobitelu, sve je kriptirano i spremljeno na zaštićenim serverima do kojih nitko ne može doći (u skladu s regulativom PCI DSS), a aplikacija je zaštićena PIN-om ili biometrijom (otisak prsta i ostale opcije). Kao što vidš, Erste banka misli na sve.

Make life easier with mojaRBA mobile banking

Download the app, open the current account with a service package online and manage your finance 24/7 from anywhere. 

All essentials in one place 
- detailed display of balances and movements in accounts, savings and loans
- simple search of transactions by date or a specific word 

Your offer
- customized offers of RBA products and services that you can contract 100% online through the app

Payments in seconds
- FotoNalog for invoice barcode scanning
- KlikPay for free money transfers to contacts, with RBA and elsewhere, no IBAN required

Buy Now Pay Later 
- split your credit card expenses into 2 or up to 24 instalments

Zlatna RBICA
- total points accumulated in the loyalty program and converting them into Zlatna RBICA euros

Saving for the future
- deposits into and balance of the account of Raiffeisen Voluntary Pension Fund

mToken 
- login to internet banking and eCitizen
-payment authentication for online card purchases

App reactivation  
- when you change your phone and number, and when you reset the device to default settings

Chat with RBA
- exchanging authenticated messages with the bank, related to your products and services

PBZ digital banking is your solution for banking on the go.
Imagine notifications in real time, an easy way to pay and send money anywhere you want in the world, full control of your finances at your fingertips. Great, right?
Join our satisfied customers and experience new and easier banking.

Control and manage your money
● Get notifications in real time for activities on your account, cards, savings, loans
● Withdraw money on ATMs wthout the card using #withCASH
● Round up every payment with Visa Inspire card and save from your spare change as you go with #withSAVE
● Set up your personal transaction limits

Pay quick and easy
● Make worldwide payments easier than ever before
● Make payments to friends at lightspeed #withPAY
● Use Apple Pay for fast, simple and contactless payments with your mobile phone and Visa Inspire card. It’s free.
● Pay to the selected recipients without additional authorization
● Scan 2 D bar code or your payment slip and pay online

Personalize your app
● Select TOP 5 shortcuts for the most commonly used functionalities
● Check the status of the selected account without loging in to the mobile app
● Use a fingerprint or face ID to quickly register and authorize transactions

Transfer money in the easier way
● Transfer money abroad in different currencies
● Set up direct debits and recurring payments in seconds
● Split the bill with friends and family and we’ll take care of the math

Safety & security
● All data related to accounts and PIN are not saved on the mobile phone
● After three repeated input of the wrong PIN, the app becomes inactive, which is further secured from unwanted access
● Biometric ID (fingerprint or face ID) is used for quicker and safer login and autorization of the transactions
● Your card transactions when shopping online are 3D Secure for additional authentication and fraud protection

You can use our app even if you're not our client so you'll have the overview of PBZ ATMs and branches as well as the Bank's contacts available when you need them.

PBZ mobile banking is also available on Apple Watch devices.

PBZ digital banking is banking made easy.

Uz novu mobilnu aplikaciju CKB GO, sve što ti treba za svakodnevno bankarstvo je na dohvat ruke - jednostavno, brzo i sigurno.



Bez obzira da li želiš da provjeriš stanje na računu, platiš račun, pošalješ novac ili podesiš limite za karticu, sve to sada možeš obaviti u nekoliko dodira.



Šta ti omogućava CKB GO?



Plaćanje računa - jednostavno i brzo, bez čekanja u redu
Trajni nalozi - automatska plaćanja za tvoje obaveze, bez brige da ćeš nešto zaboraviti
Podesi limite kartica - potpunu kontrolu imaš u svojim rukama
Pregled rata - lako prati otplatu kredita i svoje finansijske obaveze
Otvori štednju online - brzo i bez papirologije
Slanje novca putem QR koda - jednostavno podijeli ili primi sredstva
Sigurnost i kontrola - tvoja sredstva i podaci su uvijek zaštićeni
⁠Lokacije filijala i bankomata - uvijek znaš gdje ti je najbliža CKB filijala ili bankomat



Zašto baš CKB GO?



24/7 dostupnost 
Moderan i pregledan dizajn
Intuitivno korišćenje, sve je tu gdje očekuješ
Brže obavljanje transakcija i potpuna kontrola finansija



Bez obzira da li plaćaš račune, šalješ novac prijateljima, otvaraš štednju ili tražiš najbliži bankomat, sa CKB GO aplikacijom sve to možeš obaviti kad god ti odgovara.





Preuzmi novu CKB GO aplikaciju i doživi jednostavnije bankarstvo.

Bez obzira na to gdje se nalazili, m-zaba vam omogućuje potpunu kontrolu nad financijama.
m-zabom možete:
•	plaćati račune putem m-foto plati
•	uplaćivati na račune u Hrvatskoj i inozemstvu
•	prenositi novac na najjednostavniji način uslugom IziPay - dovoljno je znati broj telefona primatelja
•	provjeravati stanja i promete po računima, štednjama i kreditima
•	dobiti informativni izračun gotovinskog i stambenog kredita
•	ugovoriti gotovinski kredit, kreditnu karticu, dopušteno prekoračenje
•	ugovoriti ili promijeniti paket proizvoda i usluga
•	naknadno podijeliti na rate jednokratne transakcije učinjene Individualnom Mastercard kreditnom karticom ili one po tekućem računu u eurima
•	pronaći sve informacije o karticama, provjeriti PIN-ove, upravljati dnevnim limitima te blokirati karticu u slučaju gubitka ili krađe 
•	dobivati obavijesti o primljenim uplatama
•	trgovati udjelima u fondovima ZB Investa i kreirati svoj investicijski plan te ugovarati  do pet trajnih naloga istovremeno u različite investicijske fondove
•	trgovati na svjetskim burzama uz uslugu ZB Trader Global
•	plaćati parking te uzeti listić s brojem za red u poslovnici.

m-zabu ugovorite u poslovnici.  

SIGURNOST

Zagrebačka banka posvećuje posebnu pozornost sigurnosti korisnika mobilnog bankarstva.
•	PIN kojim se pristupa poznat je samo korisniku, stoga u slučaju krađe ili gubitka mobitela ne može doći do zlouporabe.
•	Podaci o PIN-u i računima ne pohranjuju se u mobitel, a unos PIN-a zaštićen je varijabilnom tipkovnicom.
•	Usluge kojima se pristupa PIN-om automatski se blokiraju u slučaju višestrukog uzastopnog unosa netočnog PIN-a.
•	Nakon tri minute nekorištenja m-zaba će automatski odjaviti korisnika.

Regardless of where you are, m-zaba gives you complete control over your finances.
With m-zaba you can:
• pay bills via m-foto pay
• make payments to the accounts in Croatia and abroad
• easily transfer money with the IziPay service. Recipient’s phone number is all you need. 
• check the balances and transfers of accounts, savings, and loans
• obtain an informative calculation of cash and housing loan
• arrange a cash loan, credit card, contracted overdraft
• contract or change a package of products and services
• subsequently divide one-time transactions made with an Individual Mastercard credit card or transactions on the current account in euros into instalments
• find all card information, check PIN’s, manage daily limits and block the card in the event of loss or theft
• receive notifications about received payments
• trade shares in ZB Invest funds and create your investment plan and contract up to five standing orders into investment funds
• trade on world stock exchanges with the ZB Trader Global service.
• pay for parking and take queue number ticket for the queue in the branch office.
Arrange m-zaba in a branch. 

SAFETY
Zagrebačka Banka pays special attention to the security of operations performed by mobile banking clients.
•	PIN used to access the services is only known by the user and therefore there is no threat of abuse if a mobile device is stolen or lost.
•	PIN and account information are not stored in the mobile device, and the entry of PIN is protected by a variable keypad.
•	The services that are accessed by entering PIN are automatically blocked if an incorrect PIN is repeatedly entered.
•	After a 3-minute period of inactivity, m-zaba automatically logs out the user.

We believe that digital banking should be as simple as ABC. Download the application and experience banking made easy, whenever and wherever.

In OTPgo application you can find our product catalogue and the list of locations of our branches and ATMs.

Here are only some of the options and transactions available to you with OTPgo application: 

• Check your account balance at any time
• Check your account turnover
• Check the details of any products contracted with the bank such as loans, savings or credit cards
• Make intra-bank and inter-bank payments
• Make payments to foreign accounts – new transaction
• Create payment order templates for frequent payments, so as to make them even easier
• Buy or sell foreign currency using your foreign currency accounts
• Top up mobile phone
• Make a simple transfer of funds to your prepaid card(s)
• Make various transfers and payments towards your loan, to your saving account or credit card
• Join the OTP Round Up donation scheme and view all your donations
• Join the OTPrize loyalty scheme and have access to it at all times
• Share your account information via QR code

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

BPŠ mBanka aplikacija namenjena fizičkim licima je digitalni servis, koji vam omogućava da Banka bude uvek u vašim rukama i dostupna 24/7, bez obzira gde se nalazite. Novo rešenje omogućava bezbedno i brzo logovanje, potpuni nadzor nad finansija i brojne druge pogodnosti.

Mobilna aplikacija BPŠ Banke omogućava vam da brzo, jednostavno i sigurno obavite svakodnevne bankarske transakcije bez odlaska na šalter. 

Korisnicima su u aplikaciji dostupne brojne mogućnosti:



- Pregled stanja po svim računima, karticama, štednji i kreditima
- Upravljajte limitima na vašim karticama
- Podela na rate kreditnim karticama
- Promena PIN-a platne kartice
- Plaćanje u dinarima sa zakazivanjem u budućnosti
- Prenos novca između vaših računa u Banci
- Plaćanje putem IPS skeniraj ili očitavanjem QR kod putem IPS pokaži
- Prenos novca putem broja mobilnog telefona putem „Prenesi“
- Kupovina i prodaja stranih valuta 
- Sačuvani detalji šabloni i primoca naloga za brže plaćanja
- Lokacije sa navigacijom vama najbliže ekspoziture ili bankomata Banke
- Ugovaranje trajnih naloga i elektronsko plaćanje komunalnih usluga 
- Upravljanje korisničkim profilom
- Prijava sa biometrijskom autentifikacijom
- Kontrola obaveštenja
- Direktnu i dvsomernu komunikacija sa Bankom
- Informacije o proizvodima i uslugama



Uživajte u inovativnom korišćenju aplikacije na pravi način i u svim pogodnostima unapređenog digitalnog bankarstva, koje vam omogućava BPŠ Banka.

Kako bi bili još bolji, pozivamo vas da nam pomognete u tome tako što će te ostaviti recenziju nakon korišćenja aplikacije.

Hvala vam što koristite BPŠ mBanking aplikaciju!

mPorezna – mobilna aplikacija Ministarstva financija – Porezne uprave


Mobilna aplikacija mPorezna povećava dostupnost elektroničkih usluga Ministarstva financija - Porezne uprave poreznim obveznicima te smanjuje troškove ispunjavanja poreznih obveza.

Aplikacija je razvijena u sklopu projekta „Povezivanje i unaprjeđenje aplikativnih rješenja unutar Informacijskog sustava Porezne uprave i razvoj mPorezne“ sufinanciranog od Europske unije iz Europskog socijalnog fonda.

Porezni obveznici koji su korisnici mobilnih uređaja mogu kroz mobilnu aplikaciju ostvariti uvid u svoje podatke, zaprimljene poruke i porezne akte, mogu podnositi zahtjeve, dobiti važne informacije o svojim poreznim obvezama i poslati upit Poreznoj upravi koji se tiče sustava ePorezna i mPorezna.

Porezni obveznici putem aplikacije mogu vidjeti i stanje na porezno knjigovodstvenoj kartici (PKK), preuzeti 2D barkod za provođenje plaćanja, pregledati detalje podnesenih obrazaca i zahtjeva, provjeriti obavijesti i rokove podnošenja obrazaca kroz personalizirani porezni kalendar, mogu podnijeti zahtjev za izmjenom podataka na poreznoj kartici (PK), zahtjev za izdavanje potvrde o stanju duga, zahtjev za izmjenom podataka u Registru poreznih obveznika, informativno izračunati podatke o plaći putem usluge kalkulatora za izračun plaće, direktno se obratiti Poreznoj upravi putem servisa „Pišite nam“ te anonimno prijaviti porezni i drugi prekršaj.

Također, poreznim obveznicima omogućen je  uvid u podatke iz JOPPD obrasca (Izvješće o primicima, porezu na dohodak i prirezu te doprinosima za obvezna osiguranja) za korisnika usluge, Uvid u IP1/IP2 - uvid u podatke o plaći, mirovini, doprinosima, porezu i prirezu koji ulaze u godišnji obračun (obračunati i isplaćeni primici) i Uvid u IP3 - uvid u podatke o plaći, mirovini, doprinosima, porezu i prirezu koji ne ulaze u godišnji obračun.

Funkcionalnosti su prilagođene radu na manjim ekranima kako bi iskustvo korištenja bilo optimalno uz mogućnost podešavanja veličine slova i boje ekrana. Za korištenje aplikacije potrebno se prijaviti putem Nacionalnog identifikacijskog i autentifikacijskog sustava (NIAS) koristeći jednu od priznatih vjerodajnica NIAS sustava. Za prijavu u aplikaciju potrebno je posjedovati valjanu NIAS vjerodajnicu značajne ili niske razine sigurnosti: značajna razina sigurnosti uključuje na primjer mToken, Fina Soft certifikat, token/mtoken uređaje banaka koji su povezani sa sustavom NIAS dok niska razina sigurnosti uključuje ePass, ePošta, AAI@EduHr korisničko ime i lozinku, HT Telekom ID.

Strateški cilj Porezne uprave je dvostrana elektronička komunikacija Porezne uprave i poreznih obveznika, stoga je uspostava elektroničkih usluga na mobilnim platformama značajan korak u širenju kruga korisnika i proširenja dostupnosti elektroničkih usluga Porezne uprave poreznim obveznicima. U sklopu ovog projekta razvijene su nove funkcionalnosti sustava ePorezna kroz uspostavu krovne mobilne aplikacije mPorezna unutar koje će se kroz funkcije mobilnih aplikacija omogućiti povećanje dostupnosti elektroničkih usluga Porezne uprave građanima i poduzetnicima.

Sadržaj mobilne aplikacije isključiva je odgovornost Ministarstva financija – Porezne uprave, a razvijena je od tvrtke APIS IT d.o.o.

Moja mBanka Raiffeisen – Mobilno bankarstvo bez granica!

Moja mBanka Raiffeisen objedinjuje najbolje od mobilnog bankarstva za fizička i pravna lica. Instalirajte aplikaciju, otvorite potpuno besplatno iRačun za 15 minuta iz udobnosti doma i postanite naš klijent.
Zakoračite u budućnost bankarstva kao fizičko ili pravno lice.

Fizička lica

Održavanje iRačuna je 0 dinara, a uz digitalne, fizičke kartice stižu na kućnu adresu. Besplatne prenose u dinarima realizujte za 10 sekundi.

Neke od funkcionalnosti:

•	Push obaveštenja za promene po računima
•	Logovanje i potvrda plaćanja skeniranjem lica ili otiskom prsta
•	Inbox za komunikaciju sa bankom
•	Plaćanje računa skeniranjem QR koda i kreiranje šablona
•	Kupoprodaja valuta
•	Privremena blokada kartica i pregled podataka
•	Automatska kategorizacija troškova u opciji Moje finansije
•	Podizanje gotovine bez kartice uz QR kod i Mobilni Keš
•	Plaćanja ka inostranstvu i potvrde priliva
•	Praćenje ulaganja u investicione i penzijske fondove
•	Ugovaranje proizvoda u opciji Onlajn ponuda.

Poslovni korisnici

Moja mBanka Biznis Raiffeisen omogućava malim preduzećima i preduzetnicima da otvore više vrsta računa bez odlaska u banku - dinarski Biznis iRačun, devizni račun za ino prilive, devizni račun za kupovinu deviza i račun bolovanja.

Održavanje Biznis iRačuna je besplatno prvih 12 meseci, a platne kartice stižu na odabranu adresu.

Neke od funkcionalnosti:

•	Dinarska plaćanja skeniranjem IPS QR koda
•	Integracija sa Sistemom elektronskih faktura
•	Generisanje IPS QR koda za bržu naplatu
•	Preuzimanje prometa i izvoda
•	Devizna plaćanja uz preuzimanje SWIFT potvrda
•	Pravdanje Loro priliva
•	Podnošenja zahteva i ugovaranje dodatnih usluga

Za dodatne informacije:
•	E-mail: rol.support@raiffeisenbank.rs

•	Telefon: +381 11 3202100.

Moja mBanka Raiffeisen – Mobile banking without limits!

Moja mBanka Raiffeisen combines the best of mobile banking for private individuals and legal entities. Install the app, open iRačun free of charge in 15 minutes from the comfort of your home and become our client.
Step into the future of banking as an individual user or a legal entity.

For individual users

The iRačun maintenance fee is 0 dinars and along with the digital, the physical payment cards are sent to the client’s home address. Perform free of charge dinar transfers in 10 seconds.

Some of the functionalities:

•	Push notifications for account movements
•	Login and payment verification by face scanning or fingerprint recognition
•	Inbox for communicating with the bank
•	Bill payment by QR code scanning or creating predefined payments
•	FX purchase and selling
•	Temporary card blocking and data overview
•	Automatic categorization of expenditures in My finance option
•	Withdrawing cash without cards by using QR codes and the Mobile Cash option
•	FX international payments and verifications of incoming payments
•	Monitoring investments into investment and pension funds
•	Receiving quotes for products via the Online offer option.

For business users

Raiffeisen Moja mBanka Business enables small enterprises and entrepreneurs to open several types of accounts without visiting the bank – dinar Business iRačun, FX account for incoming international payments, FX account for purchasing foreign currency and sick leave account.

Business iRačun maintenance is free of charge in the first 12 months and payment cards are sent to the address of your choice.

Some of the functionalities:
•	Domestic payments by scanning IPS QR code
•	Integration with the Electronic invoice System
•	Generating IPS QR codes for faster payment collection
•	Downloading account turnover and statements
•	FX payments with SWIFT confirmations
•	Justifying Loro incoming payments
•	Submitting requests and contracting additional services through the app

For additional information, please contact us:
•	E-mail: rol.support@raiffeisenbank.rs
•	Phone No.: +381 11 3202100

Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.

TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels
• Support for push-notifications from the desktop platform and MQL5.community services

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
• 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

Erste mBanking usluga je mobilnog bankarstva Erste banke kojom jednostavno i sigurno možete obavljati sve svoje financijske transakcije pametnim telefonom, a uz standardnu identifikaciju 4-znamenkastim mPIN-om, ili biometrijom.
 
Jedinstveni zaslon za unos naloga još više olakšava plaćanja i prijenos sredstava. Opcija Slikaj i plati, s kojom je ručno popunjavanje naloga postalo prošlost, sad vam je nadohvat prsta, a umjesto internim prijenosom sva kunska plaćanja zadajete na jednom zaslonu.
 
Korisnici mogu učitavati fakture iz galerije ili skenirati pojedine elemente fakture, pregledavati i potpisivati naloge u kunskim datotekama te naručivati izvode i fakture za svoje poslovne račune uz znatno niže naknade.
 
Sigurnu prijavu u usluge e-bankarstva omogućuje mToken - jednostavna opcija unutar mBankinga koja unosom 4-znamenkastog mPIN-a daje kontrolu nad vlastitim transakcijama. mToken je besplatan, a za njegovo je korištenje potrebno imati ugovorenu uslugu NetBanking ili FonBanking te potom preuzeti mBanking aplikaciju.
 
Osim navedenoga, Erste mBanking omogućuje:
 
* praćenje stanja i prometa po svim Erste računima
* pregledavanje svih transakcija zadanih putem mBankinga i NetBankinga
* plaćanje svih vrsta računa u kunama općom uplatnicom te izvršavanje obveza po kreditima i obavljanje kupoprodaje deviza
* pregledavanje oročene štednje i kredita i postavljanje zahtjeva za predodobrenim kreditom
* pregledavanje stanja, transakcija i računa kreditnih kartica
* pregledavanje ugovorenih fondova te zadavanje zahtjeva za otkup i izdavanje fondova
* pregledavanje tečajne liste i preračunavanje valuta
* pronalazak najbliže Erste poslovnice ili Erste bankomata
* aktivaciju mBankinga preko aplikacije, bez odlaska u poslovnicu
* pregledavanje i ažuriranje osobnih podataka
 
Minimalna podržana verzija iOS-a je 15.2.
Za korištenje Touch ID funkcionalnosti potrebno je imati model iPhone 5S ili noviji.
Erste mBanking is Erste Bank's mobile banking service, which enables you to carry out all financial transactions using only your smartphone. Depending on settings and devices, it provides authentication by 4-digit mPIN or with biometry.

The unique/unified payment screen makes payments and fund transfers even easier. The PhotoPay feature, with which manually filling orders has become a thing of the past, is now at your fingertips, and the internal transfer option has been incorporated into a single screen, where you can make all types of national payments.

You can upload invoices from the gallery or scan parts of the invoice, review and sign orders for national payment files, and order statements and invoices for their business accounts with significantly lower fees.

Erste Bank's secure e-banking services are accessible via mToken, a simple option  within the mBanking app that lets you control all your financial transactions via a  4-digit mPIN. As a NetBanking or FonBanking user, you can download the free mBanking app and start using the mToken option.

In addition to the above, Erste mBanking allows:

* monitoring of balance and traffic by all Erste accounts,
* view all transactions made on mBanking and NetBanking,
* payment of all types of national invoices by general payment slip, execution of obligations per loans, and conducting foreign currency purchases,
* reviewing terms of savings and loans as well as setting requirements for a pre-approved loan,
* check balances, transactions, and view credit card accounts,
* reviewing contracted funds and issuing requests for the purchase and issuance of funds,
* viewing exchange rates and converting currencies,
* assistance in locating the nearest Erste branch or Erste ATM,
* activation of the mBanking app through the application itself, without visiting the branch,
* view and update of personal information.
 
Minimal version requirement: iOS 15.2.
 
The Touch ID feature is available on iPhone 5s or later.

16 million+ customers send, receive, spend and grow their money internationally with Wise. It’s the fast, simple way to move money in 160 countries and 40 currencies. Products available depend on where you live. Check wise.com or download the app to see what’s available for you.

— International money transfers —
• Send money to 70+ countries, fast
• Get the mid-market exchange rate, like on Google, for every money transfer
• On average, 64% of transfers arrive in under 20 seconds, and 95% arrive within 24 hours
• Secure your transfers with two-factor authentication, encryption and biometrics

— The debit card that’s always got the right currency —
• Spend or withdraw cash in more than 160+ countries
• If you don’t have the local currency, we’ll auto-convert what you have with the lowest possible price
• Freeze and unfreeze your card, and update your digital card details

— Get paid like a local —
• Get your own UK account number and sort code, European IBAN, Australian account details and more, as if you had local bank accounts around the world
• Use these account details to get paid in multiple currencies for free, and for direct debits
• Keep up-to-date with instant push notifications for every transaction

— Hold 40 currencies and convert between them instantly —
• No monthly fee and no maintenance fee to keep money in your account, in most cases
• Convert between currencies instantly, at the real exchange rate, for a super-low fee
• Auto-convert currencies at specific rates, and keep up to date with exchange rates with Rate Alerts

— Put your money to work with Assets —
• Try Interest or Stocks in a few taps. Available in the UK, Singapore and multiple EEA countries, for now
• Capital at risk, growth not guaranteed

— A better business account for going global —
• Pay invoices and bills faster, at a better exchange rate
• Use account details to get paid by clients and customers around the world
• Connect to supported platforms like Amazon, Stripe, Xero, and more

Wise is regulated by local authorities around the world.

Splitwise is the easiest way to share expenses with friends and family and stop stressing about “who owes who”. Millions of people around the world use Splitwise to organize group bills for households, trips, and more. Our mission is to reduce the stress and awkwardness that money places on our most important relationships.
 
Splitwise is great for:
- Roommates splitting rent and apartment bills
- Group trips around the world
- Splitting a vacation house for skiing or at the beach
- Weddings and bachelor/bachelorette parties
- Couples sharing relationship costs
- Friends and co-workers who go out to lunch or dinner together frequently
- Loans and IOUS between friends 
- And so much more
 
Splitwise is simple to use:
- Create groups or private friendships for any splitting situation
- Add expenses, IOUs, or informal debts in any currency, with support for offline entry
- Expenses are backed up online so everyone can log in, view their balances, and add expenses
- Keep track of who should pay next, or settle up by recording cash payments or using our integrations
 
We also have powerful features that can handle almost any money sharing situation. Here are some of our industry-leading features:
- Multi-platform support for smartphones and web
- Simplify debts into the easiest repayment plan
- Expense categorization
- Calculate group totals
- Export to CSV
- Comment directly on expenses
- Split expenses equally or unequally by percentages, shares, or exact amounts
- Add informal debts and IOUs
- Create bills that reccur monthly, weekly, yearly, fortnightly
- Add multiple payers on a single expense
- See total balances with a person across multiple groups and private expenses
- Custom user avatars
- Cover photos for groups 
- Activity feed and push notifications help you stay on top of changes
- View your edit history for changes to an expense
- Any deleted group or bill can be restored easily
- World-class customer support
- Pay back using our integrated payments: Venmo and PayPal (US only), Paytm (India only)
- 100+ currencies and growing
- 7+ supported languages

Endorsements:
“Makes it easy to split everything from your dinner bill to rent.” - NY Times
"Fundamental for tracking finances. As good as WhatsApp for containing awkwardness." – The Financial Times
“I never fight with roommates over bills because of this genius expense-splitting app”- Business Insider
“The Single Best App You Can Download for Group Trips of Any Kind” - Thrillist
“Life Changing! I don’t review many things, but this app has seriously improved my quality of life. It has saved my sanity when it comes to splitting utilities, mortgage, groceries, dog expenses...the list goes on. No more saving receipts, making spreadsheets, and manually calculating each month. So handy for group trips/weekends, too! THANK YOU!!” – Courtney via the App Store

We offer in-app purchases for “Splitwise Pro”, the benefits of which are described below. The subscription amount will be charged to your App Store account and will vary by plan and country. You’ll see the total price before completing your first payment. If you don’t choose to purchase “Splitwise Pro”, you can continue using Splitwise for free.

Premium Subscription Service “Splitwise Pro”:
1. Store high-resolution receipts in the cloud (10GB cloud storage)
2. OCR integration for scanning and itemizing receipts
3. Backups to JSON, downloadable from our website
4. Convert expenses to different currencies using our Open Exchange Rates integration
5. Access to “spending by category” budgeting tools and other charts
6. Search full expense history

“Splitwise Pro” subscriptions purchased in-app renew monthly or yearly depending on your plan. Plan pricing may vary by country. To avoid renewal, you must turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before your subscription ends. You can turn off auto-renew at any time by visiting the App Store.

Terms of Service and Privacy Policy: https://www.splitwise.com/terms

ENG: NLB Pay is a mobile wallet app that facilitates secure, quick, and contactless payments. It allows financial management, card security options, transaction tracking, and making payments from your smartphone. The app features Flik instant payments for immediate money transfer using phone numbers or email addresses, and QR code payments in stores. It integrates seamlessly with Apple Wallet for NLB cards and provides instant transaction updates via push notifications.

SLO: NLB Pay je mobilna denarnica, ki omogoča varna, hitra in brezstična plačila s pametnimi telefoni in napravami. Omogoča tudi dvigovanje gotovine na brezstičnih bančnih avtomatih, varnostno upravljanje kartic in sledenje transakcijam. Aplikacija vključuje Flik takojšnja plačila za takojšnji prenos denarja s pomočjo telefonskih številk ali e-poštnih naslovov ter plačila s QR kodo v trgovinah. Brezhibno se integrira z Apple Walletom za NLB kartice in omogoča takojšnje obveščanje o transakcijah preko potisnih sporočil.
Uporabniki lahko povežejo račune NLB bank, trenutno podprto za banki NLB Slovenija in NLB Črna Gora. NLB kartice je sedaj mogoče dodati neposredno v Apple Wallet prek aplikacije.
